title: Change Account Risk Profile
description: A client has received a promotion and wants to increase their risk tolerance from 'Balanced' to 'Growth'.

tasks.description: Administer a new risk tolerance questionnaire to confirm the client's suitability for a higher risk profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the new questionnaire results align with a 'Growth' profile.

tasks.description: Update the client's official risk profile in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the client's profile setting.

tasks.description: Discuss the necessary portfolio changes to align with the new 'Growth' strategy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains that this will involve selling some bonds to buy more stocks.
